name: Snowy Adventure - 3d FPS
description:
Three significant modifications 1) Design Modifications
  • All 3 levels are unique and coherent.
    • Snowy mountain environment.
    • Linear level progression as going downward to hill.
  • Unity Texture Tools Asset is used to design the 3D terrain
  • All levels have two simultaneous music in background
    • Snowy wind hollowing music
    • Level theme music
2) Aesthetic modifications (Snowy Theme)
  • UI theme is changed to snowy.
    • Fonts, UI menu and button theme is changed.
    • All buttons and panel have new sprites.
    • In-Game UI is also update to snowy theme
    • New effects and animations are added.
3) Gameplay Modifications (New Scripts added)
  • Snow falling particles effect created.
  • Two power ups are added 
    • Blue Bottle: increases the player movement speed
    • Red Bottle: decreases the player movement speed
